items.sentence: I had an appointment this morning that I forgot about.
I had no idea that Tom and Mary were husband and wife.
I had to stay behind so I could talk to Tom privately.
You have to pull yourself together and start studying.
Tom told Mary he wouldn\'t carry her suitcase for her.
Tom told Mary he\'d visit her in Boston every weekend.
When I got home, I realized that I had lost my wallet.
When I think back on what I did, I feel pretty stupid.
When the phone rang, Tom already knew who was calling.
When was the last time you spoke to someone in French?
